info.title: CRM API
info.description: A comprehensive REST API for managing customer relationships, including companies, contacts, deals, sales representatives, and related data.

get.description: Fetch notes and comments associated with specific contacts. Includes timestamps, sales representative information, and attachment data.

post.description: Add a new note or comment to a contact record for tracking interactions and follow-ups.

get.description: Fetch a list of all contacts in your CRM. Filter by company, sales representative, status, and other criteria. Includes contact information, communication preferences, and related company data.

post.description: Add a new contact to the CRM with email, phone, company association, and other relevant details.

get.description: Fetch a summary view of all companies with key metrics, deal counts, and recent activity.
Fetch a list of all sales team members. View their contact information, permissions, and associated deals and contacts.

post.description: Add a new member to the sales team with email and contact information.

get.description: Fetch tasks and action items assigned to contacts and deals. Filter by status, assignee, and priority.

post.description: Create a new task or action item related to a contact or deal.

get.description: Fetch notes and attachments associated with specific deals. Track deal progress and decision points.

post.description: Add a note or attachment to a deal to document progress and key discussions.

get.description: Fetch all sales deals in the pipeline. Filter by stage, amount, company, and sales representative. Includes related contacts and expected closing dates.

post.description: Create a new sales deal with company, contacts, amount, stage, and expected closing date.

get.description: Fetch all tags used in the system for organizing contacts, deals, and companies.

post.description: Create a new tag for organizing and categorizing contacts, deals, and companies.

get.description: Fetch a summary view of all contacts with key information, company affiliation, and associated deals.
Fetch all companies in the CRM with details about their contacts, deals, and sales activities.

post.description: Add a new company to the CRM with contact and business information.
